dialog: I seem to have had a dream—a vision of my future. But where exactly was that place?
Noble Queen Hera, please forgive my sudden intrusion. Allow me a moment to introduce myself…
Ah! Who are you? Appearing out of nowhere like that is quite alarming!
I am Loki, known as the “God of Deception.” I apologize for eavesdropping on your musings. It just so happens that I know the location of the place you dreamed of.
Really? Then please take me there.
That is precisely why I’m here. However… I need to test your strength first. After all, I can’t guarantee I’ll be able to protect you once we get there.
You want to have a contest? Fine, let’s do it your way.
Queen Hera, this is the place you dreamed of—the Sanctum of the Founders. Ah… I must say, that last blow really hurt.
It’s the price one must pay for challenging the authority of a chief deity. By the way, what exactly is this place? Why does it feel so familiar?
Because this is where the gods were born.
She’s right. This is the place where the Creator bestowed upon us our divine essences.
Feel free to let me know if you need any more changes!
I prophesied your revival, Hera. Right here, right now, you have gained that primordial power. However, I cannot allow you to bring such power back to our world!
Why not? I simply want to understand what I saw in my dream… Besides, I have no interest in this so-called revival you speak of.
It’s too late. Your dream itself is a guide, and you are already on the path to revival. I’m sorry, but I must use force to expel you from this Sanctum!
Apollo has retreated, but I sense that this isn’t over. There will be others waiting for us ahead.
Loki, tell me the truth—what does Apollo mean by “revival”?
It is the primal force of creation, the original form of us goddesses. To possess it is to have the power to create worlds… Be cautious, someone is coming.
What a pleasure, my Queen Hera. I didn’t expect to see you even in a place like this.
Hades, what are you doing here?
Did you think you were the only one to dream of this place? Hmm? I’d wager that little one beside you also had a dream. Watch your back, or you might end up being someone else’s cover.
Keep your distance, or I’ll be forced to use violence!
Why should I move? Do you think this secret is yours alone to know?
The environment is starting to change. What’s happening, Loki?
We must have reached a new area. There’s light ahead, indicating that someone arrived before us.
Hello, Queen Hera. I’ve been waiting for you here for quite some time.
Did you come here because of the dream as well?
I didn’t have any dreams. Someone offered a substantial reward for me to wait here for you.
Oh? And who asked you to wait for me?
That’s a secret. You’ll have to guess for yourself.
It looks like Cupid has been enchanted or deceived. Let’s proceed and see if other goddesses have also been lured here.
That’s… Icarus.
Greetings, Queen Hera. I trust you’re well.
Are you here to obstruct me as well, having been similarly deceived?
Deceived? I came here of my own volition. My wings can carry me to various worlds, and this is just one of them.
What brings you here?
I’ve heard there’s a treasure here that can enhance flying abilities. I intend to acquire it.
I suppose if I want to get past here, I’ll have to go through you?
Indeed. The treasure I seek won’t be handed over easily.
Is this the end? I don’t see how this place is any different from the others.
If your hands are empty, you might see nothing. But with the blood of a chief deity, things change.
What do you mean?
I’m sorry, Queen Hera, but I deceived you. I lured you here and even made a deal with Cupid to obtain your blood and reveal the secrets of the Seventh Divine Realm!
The Seventh Divine Realm!
Indeed. Now, let’s see how you, the trapped lamb, will struggle to survive!
It seems Hades was right—you indeed have sinister intentions… It’s rare for him to be accurate.
I’ve been prepared for your betrayal. I’m eager to see how you, a defeated foe, will try to turn the tide!
No, this can’t be happening! My puppets, come forth! I need your assistance!
Calling for help when you’re outmatched? Very well, let everyone witness the power of creation I’ve obtained!
